/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_HIST_TRACE
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-04 오후 10:56:36
-- 마지막으로 수정한 날짜 : 2013-06-04 오후 10:56:36
-- 상태 : VALID
------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
DROP TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_HIST_TRACE CASCADE CONSTRAINTS;

CREATE TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_HIST_TRACE (
  PRD_DATE     VARCHAR2(8)          NULL, 
  ROUTING      VARCHAR2(5)          NULL, 
  ST_NO        VARCHAR2(3)          NULL, 
  P_CODE       VARCHAR2(3)          NULL, 
  INT_NO       VARCHAR2(12)         NULL, 
  SER_NO       VARCHAR2(4)          NULL, 
  SEQ          NUMBER(38)           NULL, 
  PROG_ID      VARCHAR2(30)         NULL, 
  ACTDTTM      VARCHAR2(17)         NULL, 
  UPLOAD_YN    VARCHAR2(1)          NULL
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
PCTFREE 10
PCTUSED 0
INITRANS 1
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
)
LOGGING
NOCACHE
MONITORING
NOPARALLEL
;

/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_HST_TRC_0
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-04 오후 10:56:36
-- 마지막으로 수정한 날짜 : 2013-06-04 오후 10:56:36
-- 상태 : VALID
------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
DROP INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_HST_TRC_0;

CREATE INDEX HVCCD_MES.IX_PMS_HST_TRC_0
ON HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_HIST_TRACE (PRD_DATE, ROUTING, ST_NO, P_CODE)
PCTFREE 10
INITRANS 2
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
    PCTINCREASE 0
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
LOGGING
NOPARALLEL;
